com.facebook.buck.jvm.java.runner

Class FileClassPathRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.jvm.java.runner.FileClassPathRunner

  • public class FileClassPathRunner
extends Object
    This class handles extra large classpaths by allowing the client to pass classpath via file specified by buck.classpath_file. WARNING: this class creates a new classloader on java 9+ and it modifies system property java.class.path.

    This class needs -Dbuck.testrunner_classes system property set testrunner classpath to work and accepts optional -Dbuck.classpath_file system property which should hold a file with additional classpath entries.

    This class has different behavior for java 8 and java 9+, neither is bullet-proof. On java 8 it adds entries from classpath_file to ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader(). On java 9+ it creates a new classloader with test_runner classes and all entries from classpath_file.

    Note: this class only depends on classes present in the JRE, since we don't want to have to push more things on to the classpath when using it.

    TODO(jtokkola): creating child classloader will not work for buck tests that use javac
